review title: Faulty IphoneX delivered, Flipkart refused to help
content:
First time in my life I ordered something so expensive from online ecommerce site and as per my fear, they delivered a faulty iPhone x. There are blurred lines appearing in portrait mode in back camera.

When I contacted Flipkart support they refused for any help and suggested to go to Apple care. So this is pity that after spending 102000/- my iPhone is laying in service centre.

The Flipkart support is useless and I am not going to make such big purchases for such sites again.

Feeling cheated for my purchase.

Regards
Sachin READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
content: Delivery from Flipkart was pathetic. I ordered on Friday night. They had to deliver on Monday and the seller didnt even ship it until Monday. Then it was in Flipkart Bangalore hub for 22 hours before it was shipped to Delhi. It took another 24 hours for it to reach Delhi and then it was out for delivery on Thursday. I was not in town, so it was re-scheduled for Monday. In between Thursday and Monday I received numerous calls and emails from Flipkart asking me to cancel the order or get it delivered to someone else at the address. I told those fools that I had taken the exchange offer and dont they want the old phone? Finally, the day came and the delivery guy called up at least 5 times before reaching the delivery address as he was new to the area. He checked the phone details IMEI number etc and took the phone. He called me back at 9pm saying that he cannot check the IMEI and asked me to Whatsapp the screenshot I had shown him during the visit. Terrible! Really Terrible!!! READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
content:
First let me share my experience with Flipkart..I got the device yesterday morning.. delivered right on time as mentioned by Flipkart on the day of prebooking . I must say Flipkart has improved a lot. I was hardcore fan of amazon now I have a better option!! I got device as well as nice little surprise in the box from Flipkart. Thanks you Flipkart for amazing service.

Now about the device..well it's much faster then I expected and Face ID works like a charm even in pitch dark. Few apps are still not optimised but the native apps are great. It's a complete visual treat. Size is in between iphone 7 and 7 plus. Speakers are much better too. One more thing I would like to mention that if you have your older device with you then switch on your Wi-fi and Bluetooth on older device then turn on iPhone X and see the magic of seamless transfer of all your data!! This is the best iphone you can buy in 2017. Cheers !! READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
content:
I highly recommend this phone if you have the buck!!
However some issues seen by me which could get addressed with software updates.
1. Face ID does not work properly in direct sunlight. And few times acted wonky. So not perfect like Touch ID.
2. RAM management is little bad compared to earlier iPhones on iOS 11.1.
3. True Tone makes the display more warm / yellow for this phone. Looks better without it.
4. Dont quite like the control center gesture position.
5. Provided charger is not a fast charger. This is a bummer by Apple
6. Glass on front and back could be risky if not handled properly.
7. Very Costly for a piece of tech whose value deteriorates over time.

Whats nice:
1. Good and big screen.
2. Speaker Sound is loud enough for a mobile
3. Wireless capability (only its too slow to charge)
4. Fast charging via MacBook Pro charger
5. India unlocked unit is based on a Qualcomm chipset which makes it a universal phone
6. Good looks and nice to hold. Not too large like iPhone Plus models.
7. Good cameras READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
review title: Iphone X is perfect! Flipkarts Delivery sucks
content:
Phone is definitely awesome.

FaceID is definitely much better than touch ID. It gets faster and faster as it learns more from every unlock.

Display is definitely the best I have used on an iPhone.

Notifications personal to a users eyes is also an amazing feature.

Battery life has definitely improved as it can survive a whole day with a heavy user like me.

Animojis are fun and the envy of my friends..haha

In total, I m definitely impressed with this device.

I was able to preorder the 256 GB space grey. My decision to go with Space Grey was definitely right. Looks classy.

The only disappointment was with Flipkarts Delivery.

Even after the preorder on 27th, Flipkart failed to deliver my phone on launch day because my shipment was travelling from one warehouse to another the whole day. This was frustrating. READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
review title: Finally a refreshed iPhone experience in years!!
content:
The phone reached me as promised on the launch day by flipkart. So full marks to flipkart for speedy delivery.

As far as the phone is concerned, I would say its a great phone. I have been an iPhone user since the time of iPhone 4 and have bought every iPhone since then. This time Apple has bought something new as compared to the iPhones in the past.
The iterations of iPhones were becoming boring and no revolutionary feature was being added by the company, iPhone X definitely changes it. So its not a boring iPhone like the other ones.

Starting with my experience:

The display is the main highlight here. Its sharp and gorgeous to look at. You will definitely be happy with it. The chin on top is unnoticeable after few minutes of using the phone.

The battery life is insane. Heavy users can expect a full day battery and for light users, it can last upto 2 days! Its Definitely better than iPhone 8 plus for that matter.

FaceId also works really well and I dont miss the TouchId.

Performance is brisk without any lag as expected. No issues there

Camera performance is also great, especially the new studio light effects and front camera portrait mode feature! I would say you wont Be disappointed from the camera of this phone. Although its similar to the camera of iPhone 8 plus upto a large extent.

Finally to conclude in brief, overall iPhone X is a great phone. The only issue is: Price of the phone is on a higher side which could have been much less in my opinion(compared to the pricing in other countries). Otherwise its the phone to buy, instead of the iPhone 8 or 8 plus if you want to upgrade from older iPhones or if you just dont want a boring old iPhone platform. I think it is worth it over the iPhone 8 plus at least.
I hope this short review helps you in deciding your purchase of this device. Cheers!!
P.S: Go for the silver colour. I think it pops more. Grey looks more generic and unrecognisable as a iPhone X.. xD READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
review title: Early Impressions of World's Most Awaited Device - iPhone X
content:
Okay, so here it is... iPhone X (it's 10 - TEN and not 'Ex' or 'X'). Before I jump to iPhone X, let me quickly comment on Flipkart's service. They delivered before the date committed (6th Nov was scheduled date whereas product received on 5th Nov itself). While delivery was scheduled for 6th Nov, fans/early adopters do expect launch day delivery and thus it would be appreciated if Flipkart can plan the same accordingly to reach all the pre-order on launch day or a day later than 2 days+. Also, the customer care team is trained to give you rhetorical answers and that can be improved.

Alright, coming back to business, iPhone X is definitely a few years ahead of the competition. The Face ID is so damn good, accurate and reliable. Works like magic. The front notch doesn't bother me and new gestures become familiar in just a few hrs as the base of iOS remains same. The camera is so damn good, that people would want you to click their pictures to be used for display pics on social media. The Design is amazing and feels premium. The glass and steel just combine edge to edge to give you a singular unibody design. Super Retina Display is so damn amazing, the contrast ratio is far far far better than previous iPhone and the black is so deep that it gives you color perfection while looking at it. Am still getting used to the True Tone display, however, you do have a facility to turn the same off. The Processor is so fast, you don't even have to wait for apps to load anymore. Even last year's iPhone (7 series) feels slower in front of A11 Bionic Processor.

Am keeping this really short. If you want it, can afford it, just go for it, cause you don't know if there is a better tomorrow. If you have any other queries or questions and need specific answers, do drop me a note on my twitter @purav_mehta READ MORE

content: Excellent phone with a crisp screen and an equally snappy performance. Build quality is top notch and the camera is one of the best among smartphones. Delivery was done on 4th Novas per the estimated date, however I was disappointed to receive it nearly 24 hrs after the Indian launch, considering it was dispatched from a warehouse not even 20kms away from my residence. 0 marks for flipkart on the delivery. The packaging was done pretty nice though and came with a special Apple and Flipkart 10 year anniversary box. Loved that! READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
review title: iPhone X Show completely satisfied the fans
content:
1. Excellent display and I never saw this kind of display quality in any other Mobiles. The display itself phone
2. The FaceID functionality is nice and the way it deals with the notifications is excellent. Notifications will be shown only if it identifies ur face. Apple didnt tell much about this in their demos. But this is an excellent feature.
3.Battery backup is decent and it will be further improved with the future software updates.
4. Excellent camera and sometimes u will get a feeling that the photos and videos taken from this camera will match the DSLR standards.
5. I thought the top notch in the display will be a problem while viewing the content but in reality it was not the case and I didnt feel that while watching the videos as well. Very minimal
6. Also I thought that screen will be much smaller but because of the full edge to edge display I never got that feeling and infact I am seeing more content on my display and which is excellent.
7. I used SAMSUNG S8 for a while and its Display also awesome but after using this iPhone X I got a feeling that this display is much better.
8. Thanks to the flipkart for delivering it on the launch day READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
content:
X loses its home button. Honestly, even the thought was life disruptive since I have been using the iPhones in the last decade. But it took me just 2 days to completely change that thought. The X made the 7+ feel primitive in a couple of days flat. I do NOT miss the previous generations anymore.
If u are a large screen fan, you may still want to wait till Oct 2018 wherein Apple may release a bigger ver of X.
The Phone is overall a HIT READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
content:
Mind blowing! That's how I would describe my experience with the iPhone X.
Those planning to shift from Android will come to know the beauty of software & hardware integration.
The phone functions seamlessly. It's battery can last 12-14 hours if graphics intensive games are avoided and the loudspeaker use kept to minimum.
Currently there is a difference of 13K INR between 64GB & 256GB models. I would definitely recommend the 264GB model as one can do limitless things with this phone.
Cameras are superb. The display is "top notch"!
You will almost never be bored using the phone. And of course, the face id works brilliantly. It's designed & engineered to perfection.
A strong piece of advice - Buy a good case and tempered glass for the phone. READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
review title: Power house: iphone X, 256gb, space grey
content:
I was desperately looking for this phone, since 3rd of November, I used to check flipkart everyday about 3-4 times a day and one lucky day at around 6 am in the morning I found one on flipkart. I wanted to buy a 64gb version in silver but at that time 256 gb was available in space grey, so I went ahead and ordered it at the very moment. I was at the right place at the right time, because after ordering it went back to out of stock.

Talking about delivery, flipkart suggested that I would get the device 3-4 days later but got it the very next day at around 10:30AM.

Packing was okay, to be honest it was pretty mediocre. It was wrapped in standard flipkart plastic wrap and had 2-3 layers of bubble wrap on the phone box. Thats the least kind of protection for a product that costs a whopping 1.02Lakh INR.

Talking about phone, you can never go wrong with apple. I have a 6s, 7 plus, galaxy s8 plus and now iphone x. Talking about iphone X, it has been one of the most controversial phones ever. The phone is a power house, performs everything smoothly. The notch is there but hardly affects me in my day to day life, oled screen is awesome. Take my word and if you have that kind of money to spend on, then surely go ahead with this phone(if you can find one). READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
content:
Most complete phone there is.
Looks Good ? Of course.
Best screen ? Yes, its Amoled but with Apple specified specs.
Camera ? Very awesome.
Portrait mode ? Yes, front and back.
Good battery life ? Yes, 8 hrs of usage time.
3D Touch ? Yes and very useful.
Best feedback system there is in any smartphone ? Hell yes. No body does it better than Apple when it comes to vibration feedback in smartphones.
Face ID ? More convenient than Touch ID.
Face ID fast ? Yes and it work almost all the times.
Phone feels snappy ? Hell yes.
Best processor ? Hell yes.
Stereo speaker ? Yes
Wireless charging ? Yes
Fast charging ? Yes
Ram ? 3GB but its good enough for iOS because of a lot of system optimisation that Apple does.
120 Hz Touch input, you have to use the phone to get it.
No home button ? You will never need it once to get used to the new gestures. READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone X (Space Gray, 256 GB)
content:
As always awesome quality from Apple. Neural Engine on A11 bionic processor really kept up its hype. Face ID is fast and convenient

There will be a learning curve to get used to the new Gestures but it wont take more than a couple of hours

Wish Apple could have included a 60hz display. But I would blame Samsung for that for pricing the current display at higher than the usual price when supplying to Apple and restricting them to go for a higher refresh rate display like on iPad Pro

No regrets for lack of Touch ID and no iPhone X owner will have. READ MORE
